original: bsal te zhes bya ba ni spangs pa'o //
analyzed: bsal te zhes bya ba ni spangs pa'o //
translated: The expression having eliminated means having abandoned.

original: 'jig rten ni 'jig rten gyi chos la'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten ni 'jig rten gyi chos la'o //
translated: The world is the mundane factors.

original: rnyed pa dang grags pa dang bstod pa la ni brnab sems so //
analyzed: rnyed pa dang grags pa dang bstod pa la ni brnab sems so //
translated: Greed is in regard to gain, fame, and praise.

original: ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang smad pa la ni yid mi bde ba'o //
analyzed: ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang smad pa la ni yid mi bde ba'o //
translated: Gloominess is in regard to non-gain, non-fame, suffering, and blame.

original: 'de dag yi shes yang dag par 'dzin pas na yang dag par 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'de dag yi shes yang dag par 'dzin pas na yang dag par 'dzin pa'o //
translated: These are correct graspings because they are the correct graspings of knowledge.

original: yang na yang dag par spang pa'o //
analyzed: yang na yang dag par spang pa'o //
translated: Or else, they are correct abandonings.

original: de ni rnam pa bzhi ste/'di lta ste //
analyzed: de ni rnam pa bzhi ste/'di lta ste //
translated: They are of four kinds, as follows:

original: mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do //
translated: One generates will for the abandonment of arisen unwholesome factors.

original: 'bad do // brtson 'grus tsom mo //
analyzed: 'bad do // brtson 'grus tsom mo //
translated: One makes effort, exerts energy, takes hold of one's mind, and strives.

original: yi shes rab tu 'dzin to //
analyzed: yi shes rab tu 'dzin to //
translated: One correctly grasps wisdom.

original: yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin du sdig pa mi dge ba'i chis rnam ma skyed pa mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang // de bzhin du dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang //
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin du sdig pa mi dge ba'i chis rnam ma skyed pa mi skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang // de bzhin du dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang //
translated: One settles in perfect meditative equipoise.üîΩ Similarly, one generates enthusiasm in order to not generate evil, unwholesome factors that have not yet arisen.üîΩ Similarly, in order to generate wholesome factors that have not yet arisen.

original: de bzhin du dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang phyir zhing 'byung ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang phyir zhing 'byung ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Similarly, in order to maintain wholesome factors that have arisen and to further increase them.

original: de la go cha'i btson 'grus kyis 'di ltar bya'o snyam pa'i 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la go cha'i btson 'grus kyis 'di ltar bya'o snyam pa'i 'dun pa skyed do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In this regard, one generates enthusiasm thinking, I will do this through the armor-like effort.

original: sbyor ba'i btson 'grus kyis ni 'bad do //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i btson 'grus kyis ni 'bad do //
translated: One makes effort through the effort of application.

original: skyo ba med pa'i btson 'grus kyis ni btson 'grus tsom mo //üîΩthabs kyi btson 'grus kyis ni yi shes rag tu 'jog go //
analyzed: skyo ba med pa'i btson 'grus kyis ni btson 'grus tsom mo // thabs kyi btson 'grus kyis ni yi shes rag tu 'jog go //
translated: One is not discouraged through the effort of non-discouragement.üîΩ One is not satisfied through the effort of satisfaction.

original: de la bying ba la ni sems rab tu 'dzin bas mtho bar byed do //
analyzed: de la bying ba la ni sems rab tu 'dzin bas mtho bar byed do //
translated: In this regard, one elevates through the mental engagement of elevation when there is laxity.üîΩ One settles through the mental engagement of settling when there is excitation.

original: rgod ba la ni mngon par bsdus pas sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog go //
analyzed: rgod ba la ni mngon par bsdus pas sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog go //
translated: In agitation, one should settle the mind by contraction.

original: rdzu 'khrul ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnams ni rdzu 'khrul gyi gnas pa yin pa'i phyir rdzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'khrul ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnams ni rdzu 'khrul gyi gnas pa yin pa'i phyir rdzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: The bases of psychic power are the four bases of psychic power, because they are the bases of psychic power.

original: de yang bzhi ste 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang // brtson 'grus @38b kyi ting nge 'dzin dang // sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang // dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de yang bzhi ste 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang // brtson 'grus @38b kyi ting nge 'dzin dang // sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang // dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: They are four: the concentration of will, the concentration of energy, the concentration of mind, and the concentration of investigation.

original: 'di ltar la la ni 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pas tse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin skyed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar la la ni 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pas tse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin skyed do //
translated: Thus, some generate concentration characterized by the one-pointedness of mind through intense will.

original: la la ni yang dag par spong ba'i btson 'grus kyis mi dge ba'i tshogs mi skye pa nyid dang len par bstan to //
analyzed: la la ni yang dag par spong ba'i btson 'grus kyis mi dge ba'i tshogs mi skye pa nyid dang len par bstan to //
translated: Some, through the energy of correct abandonment, take up the non-arising of the accumulation of non-virtue.

original: la la ni gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid kyis sems yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: la la ni gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid kyis sems yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: Some fully grasp the mind through the characteristics of abiding, full grasp, and equanimity.

original: la la ni mi dge ba'i las phra mo yang dag par spyod dam 'on te yang dag par mi spyod ces gang bdag nyid yongs su dpyod pa de ni yang dag par nges par spong ngo //
analyzed: la la ni mi dge ba'i las phra mo yang dag par spyod dam 'on te yang dag par mi spyod ces gang bdag nyid yongs su dpyod pa de ni yang dag par nges par spong ngo //
translated: Some, who are investigating themselves, ask: ‚ÄúDo I practice the wholesome or unwholesome?‚Äù They then apply themselves to the four right efforts in order to eliminate the obscurations that are far away and to abandon the latent tendencies.

original: de dag gis kun nas dkrig pa thag ring du gyur nas bag nyal spang pa'i phyir gong du yang dag par spong ba bzhi po de dag gis btson 'grus rtsom pa na spong pa'i 'du byed brgyad mngon par 'byung ba yin te //
analyzed: de dag gis kun nas dkrig pa thag ring du gyur nas bag nyal spang pa'i phyir gong du yang dag par spong ba bzhi po de dag gis btson 'grus rtsom pa na spong pa'i 'du byed brgyad mngon par 'byung ba yin te //
translated: The eight formative factors that facilitate relinquishment manifest.

original: 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang // dad pa dang // shin tu sgyang pa dang // dran pa dang // shes bzhin dang // sems pa dang // btang snyoms so //
analyzed: 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang // dad pa dang // shin tu sgyang pa dang // dran pa dang // shes bzhin dang // sems pa dang // btang snyoms so //
translated: They are will, effort, faith, serenity, mindfulness, awareness, volition, and equanimity.

original: de la nam zhig bdag la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa'o //
analyzed: de la nam zhig bdag la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa'o //
translated: Among them, will is the desire to generate the mundane and supramundane meditative concentrations.

original: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nges par 'joms pa ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nges par 'joms pa ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: Effort is the destruction of all unwholesome factors.

original: gong ma'i chos rtogs par bya ba la dad pa ni dad pa'o //üîΩde sngon du 'gro ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa'o //
analyzed: gong ma'i chos rtogs par bya ba la dad pa ni dad pa'o // de sngon du 'gro ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa'o //
translated: Faith is the faith in the Dharma of the higher realms.

original: de la zi gnas kyi phyogs dran pa'o //
analyzed: de la zi gnas kyi phyogs dran pa'o //
translated: Tranquility is the basis of that faith.üîΩMindfulness is the basis of the factors of enlightenment that are on the side of tranquility.

original: lhag mthong gi phyogs shes zhin no //
analyzed: lhag mthong gi phyogs shes zhin no //
translated: Awareness is the basis of the factors of enlightenment that are on the side of insight.

original: de la sems mngon par 'du shes pa ni sems pa'o //
analyzed: de la sems mngon par 'du shes pa ni sems pa'o //
translated: Thought is the mental application to the mind.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma pa ni btang snyoms so //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa ma pa ni btang snyoms so //
translated: Equanimity is the mental application to the defilement and to the purification of the mind.

original: 'dun pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong pa'o 'du byed dang ldan pa rdzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa de dben pa gnas pa dang // 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa dang // 'gog pa la gnas pa dang // rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom par byed dom //
analyzed: 'dun pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong pa'o 'du byed dang ldan pa rdzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa de dben pa gnas pa dang // 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa dang // 'gog pa la gnas pa dang // rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom par byed dom //
translated: The foot of miraculous powers endowed with will, vigor, mind, and investigation is cultivated by one who is isolated, who abides in non-attachment, who abides in cessation, and who is transformed by relinquishment.

original: de la dben pa ni nyon mongs pa las so //
analyzed: de la dben pa ni nyon mongs pa las so //
translated: Therein, isolation is from the defilements.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba ni srid pa las so //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba ni srid pa las so //
translated: Non-attachment is from existence.

original: 'gog pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
translated: Cessation is from suffering.

original: rnam par spong ba ni phung po thams cad spangs pa ste //
analyzed: rnam par spong ba ni phung po thams cad spangs pa ste //
translated: Relinquishment is from all the aggregates.

original: de ni rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ni rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba'o //
translated: It is transformed by the abandonment.

original: dbang byed pa ni dbang po ste dad pa la sogs pa snga yin no //
analyzed: dbang byed pa ni dbang po ste dad pa la sogs pa snga yin no //
translated: The faculties are the controlling faculties, faith, etc.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos bskyed pa la dbang thob pa'o phyir dbang po /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos bskyed pa la dbang thob pa'o phyir dbang po /
translated: They are called faculties because they control the arising of supramundane dharmas.

original: @39a * // rnams su 'gyur ba yin te //
analyzed: @39a * // rnams su 'gyur ba yin te //
translated: They are the five faculties,

original: dad pa'i dbang po nas shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar du'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i dbang po nas shes rab kyi dbang po'i bar du'o //
translated: from the faculty of faith to the faculty of wisdom.

original: 'dzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'i rtags mthong bas gong du khyad par gyi chos 'byung ba la re ba skyes te ston pa dang nyan thos kyi theg pa la yid ches pa skye'o //
analyzed: 'dzu 'khrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'i rtags mthong bas gong du khyad par gyi chos 'byung ba la re ba skyes te ston pa dang nyan thos kyi theg pa la yid ches pa skye'o //
translated: When one sees the signs of the possession of the limbs of enlightenment, hope arises for the future arising of the special qualities, and one has faith in the teaching and in the disciples.

original: yid ches pa de gang du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'byung ba la dbang byed pas dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yid ches pa de gang du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'byung ba la dbang byed pas dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: This faith controls the arising of supramundane dharmas, and is therefore called the faculty of faith.

original: dbang po'i stobs kyis kyang btson 'grus la sogs pa shin tu lhag par skye ste //
analyzed: dbang po'i stobs kyis kyang btson 'grus la sogs pa shin tu lhag par skye ste //
translated: By the power of the faculties, vigor, etc., are greatly increased.

original: des de zhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'byung ba la dbang byed pas brtson 'grus la sogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des de zhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'byung ba la dbang byed pas brtson 'grus la sogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it controls the arising of supramundane dharmas in that way, it is called the faculty of effort, etc.

original: des na dbang po lngar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na dbang po lngar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, there are five faculties.

original: dbang po lnga bsgom pa la ji ltar bdud la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mi tshugs shing thub par dka' bas de ltar stobs zhes bya ba mang du 'gyur te //
analyzed: dbang po lnga bsgom pa la ji ltar bdud la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mi tshugs shing thub par dka' bas de ltar stobs zhes bya ba mang du 'gyur te //
translated: How is it that the five faculties are cultivated? Since they are difficult to overcome because they are not overcome by adverse factors such as Mara, they are called powers.

original: dad pa'i stobs nas shes rab kyi stobs kyi bar ro /
analyzed: dad pa'i stobs nas shes rab kyi stobs kyi bar ro /
translated: There are many of them, from the power of faith up to the power of wisdom.

original: mthong ba'i lam la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs na byang chub dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs na byang chub dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
translated: When one realizes the truth just as it is on the path of vision, it is enlightenment and perfect enlightenment.

original: de'i yan lag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te //
analyzed: de'i yan lag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te //
translated: Its branches are the seven factors of enlightenment.

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang //
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang //
translated: the factor of perfect awakening that is pliancy,üîΩthe factor of perfect awakening that is concentration,

original: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: and the factor of perfect awakening that is equanimity.

original: de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la sogs pa bsum ni lhag mthong gi phogs so //
analyzed: de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la sogs pa bsum ni lhag mthong gi phogs so //
translated: Among these, the three beginning with the factor of perfect awakening that is the investigation of phenomena are on the side of insight.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang // btang snyoms ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs so //
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang // btang snyoms ni zhi gnas kyi phyogs so //
translated: Pliancy, concentration, and equanimity are on the side of calm abiding.

original: de dag thob pas bdag gis nyon mongs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs bar mthong nas /
analyzed: de dag thob pas bdag gis nyon mongs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs bar mthong nas /
translated: By attaining these, one sees that one has abandoned the afflictions that are to be abandoned by the path of seeing.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya bar bya ba de dag spang ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam phung po gsum du sgom par byed de //
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya bar bya ba de dag spang ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam phung po gsum du sgom par byed de //
translated: The noble path is cultivated in three aggregates in order to abandon those that are to be abandoned by cultivation.

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang // yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang // yang dag pa'i ngag dang // yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang // yang dag 'tsho ba dang // yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang // yang @39b dag pa'i dran pa dang //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang // yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang // yang dag pa'i ngag dang // yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang // yang dag 'tsho ba dang // yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang // yang @39b dag pa'i dran pa dang //
translated: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: and right concentration.

original: de la dngos po gnyis dang yang dag par rtsol ba ni shes rab kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: de la dngos po gnyis dang yang dag par rtsol ba ni shes rab kyi phung po'o //
translated: Among them, right thought and right effort are the aggregate of wisdom.

original: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang // yang dag ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang // yang dag ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'o //
translated: Right mindfulness and right concentration are the aggregate of concentration.

original: lhag ma ni tshul khrims kyi phung po ste //
analyzed: lhag ma ni tshul khrims kyi phung po ste //
translated: The rest are the aggregate of morality.üîΩMoreover, in the MadhyƒÅntavibhƒÅga,

original: de yang dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las //
analyzed: de yang dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las //
translated: it says:

original: rang bzhin yan lag gnas yan lag //
analyzed: rang bzhin yan lag gnas yan lag //
translated: The natural limbs, the limbs of abiding,

original: gsum pa nges par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gsum pa nges par 'byung ba'o //
translated: and the third is the limb of definite emergence.

original: bzhi pa phan yon yan lag yin //
analyzed: bzhi pa phan yon yan lag yin //
translated: The fourth is the branch of benefit.

original: rnam gsum nyon mongs med yan lag //üîΩ'di la gzhi gnas gnas dang ni //üîΩngo bo nyid du brtag yin //
analyzed: rnam gsum nyon mongs med yan lag // 'di la gzhi gnas gnas dang ni // ngo bo nyid du brtag yin //
translated: The three are the branch of non-affliction.üîΩHere, one should investigate the basis, the abode,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: and the very essence.

original: de la dran pa ni byang chub kyi gnas so //
analyzed: de la dran pa ni byang chub kyi gnas so //
translated: Here, mindfulness is the abode of enlightenment.

original: chos rnam par 'byed pa ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos rnam par 'byed pa ni rang bzhin no //
translated: The investigation of phenomena is the very essence.

original: btson 'grus ni nges par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: btson 'grus ni nges par 'byung ba'o //
translated: Exertion is the going forth.

original: dga' ba ni phan yon no /
analyzed: dga' ba ni phan yon no /
translated: Joy is the benefit.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnas ngan len gyi rgyu las byung ba'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i gzhi ste /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnas ngan len gyi rgyu las byung ba'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i gzhi ste /
translated: Because it arises from the cause of the fundamental affliction of affliction, serenity is the basis of non-affliction,

original: de ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the antidote to that.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni gnas so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni gnas so //
translated: Concentration is the abode.

original: btang snyoms ni ngo bo nyed do //
analyzed: btang snyoms ni ngo bo nyed do //
translated: Equanimity is the very essence.

original: yongs su gcod dang go byed dang // rnam gsum gzhan yid ches par byed //
analyzed: yongs su gcod dang go byed dang // rnam gsum gzhan yid ches par byed //
translated: The three are the conviction of others.

original: mi mthun phogs kyi gnyen por ni //
analyzed: mi mthun phogs kyi gnyen por ni //
translated: The antidotes to the adverse factors

original: lan gyi yan lag de brgyad do //
analyzed: lan gyi yan lag de brgyad do //
translated: are the eight branches of the path.

original: lta dang tshul khrims yo byad bsnyungs //üîΩgzhan la rnam par rig byed 'dod //
analyzed: lta dang tshul khrims yo byad bsnyungs // gzhan la rnam par rig byed 'dod //
translated: View, morality, and the few desiresüîΩare the antidote to the resistances.

original: nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dang // mi mthun phyogs kyi gnyen po'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dang // mi mthun phyogs kyi gnyen po'o //
translated: The limbs of enlightenment are the antidote to the afflictions and the secondary afflictions.

original: de la mthong ba'i lam la yongs su gcod pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //üîΩgzhan gyi go bar byed pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o //üîΩyang dag pa'i ngag kun nas slong bar go bar byed pa'i phyir ro /üîΩgzhan yid ches par byed pa'i yan lag ni rnam gsum ste //
analyzed: de la mthong ba'i lam la yongs su gcod pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o // gzhan gyi go bar byed pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o // yang dag pa'i ngag kun nas slong bar go bar byed pa'i phyir ro / gzhan yid ches par byed pa'i yan lag ni rnam gsum ste //
translated: Among them, right view is the determination of the path of insight.üîΩRight thought is the determination of the path of preparation.

original: yang dag pa'i ngag dang // yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang // 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ngag dang // yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang // 'tsho ba'o //
translated: Right speech is the determination of the path of meditative development.

original: @40a * // de dag ni go rims bzhin du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang // nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bying ba dang // rgod pa dang // mi mthun pa'i phyogs khyad par can gyi yon tan mngon par sgrub pa la 'gegs byed pa'i gnyen po'o don to //

original: zad la mi skye ba'i ye shes ni byang chub po //

original: de dag ni 'di la lam yin te thams cad kyang lam gyi tshogs te //
analyzed: de dag ni 'di la lam yin te thams cad kyang lam gyi tshogs te //

analyzed: ci rigs par brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa yin no //

original: gzungs zhes bya ba gcig gis tshig tu byas pa ni rigs kyi dbang du byas pa yin te //
analyzed: gzungs zhes bya ba gcig gis tshig tu byas pa ni rigs kyi dbang du byas pa yin te //

analyzed: gzungs rnams ma lus gzungs kyi tshig go //

original: aa ra pa tsa la sogs pa'i yi ge de dag la de'i don de bzhin nyid du 'jug par sgom par bsgom pa na bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na de'i don la bzod pa bskyed par 'gyur te //
analyzed: aa ra pa tsa la sogs pa'i yi ge de dag la de'i don de bzhin nyid du 'jug par sgom par bsgom pa na bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na de'i don la bzod pa bskyed par 'gyur te //
translated: When meditating on the meditation that engages with the meaning of those syllables such as arapacana in that suchness, when the meditation is complete, one will generate patience with regard to that meaning.

original: de ni bzod pa'i gzungs so //
analyzed: de ni bzod pa'i gzungs so //
translated: That is the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of patience.

original: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas bstan pa'i chos kyi phung po 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur pa ni chos kyi gzungs so //
analyzed: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas bstan pa'i chos kyi phung po 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur pa ni chos kyi gzungs so //
translated: Then, the Dharma dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ is the cause for holding the mass of the Dharma taught by the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas of the ten directions.

original: de nas de'i don 'dzin pa'i rgyu ni don gyi gzungs so //
analyzed: de nas de'i don 'dzin pa'i rgyu ni don gyi gzungs so //
translated: Then, the meaning dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ is the cause for holding their meaning.

original: de nas sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sngags don yod pa ston pa la dbang ba ni sngags kyi gzungs te //
analyzed: de nas sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sngags don yod pa ston pa la dbang ba ni sngags kyi gzungs te //
translated: Then, the mantra dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ is the power to teach the effective mantra for the protection of sentient beings.

original: de la aa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste thog ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: de la aa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste thog ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la //
translated: In this regard, the letter A is the door of all dharmas, because they are unborn from the beginning.

original: aa'i sgo ni thabs te //
analyzed: aa'i sgo ni thabs te //
translated: The door of the letter A is the method,

original: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all dharmas are realized just as they are.

original: ji ltar shes shen chos thams cad thog ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar shes shen chos thams cad thog ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How is it known? Because all dharmas are unborn from the beginning.

original: gang gi phyir chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid nam mkha' dang // mnyam ste //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid nam mkha' dang // mnyam ste //

analyzed: des ni skye ba med cing dang po nyid nas dri ma dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs nyid nas kyang skye ba med pa yin te ;
translated: Thus, it is unborn, and it is unborn even in the state of being defiled from the very beginning.

original: / de bas na de bzhin nyid la skye ba med pa nyid kyis yi ge aa'i don to //
analyzed: / de bas na de bzhin nyid la skye ba med pa nyid kyis yi ge aa'i don to //

original: yi ge ra'i sgo ni chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i phyir te //
analyzed: yi ge ra'i sgo ni chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i phyir te //
translated: The door of letters is the letter Ra, because all phenomena are free from dust.

original: de bas na ji ltar nam mkha' la rdul gyis mi gos pa de bzhin du de yang nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyis te //
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar nam mkha' la rdul gyis mi gos pa de bzhin du de yang nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyis te //
translated: Therefore, just as space is not soiled by dust, so it is not soiled by the dust of afflictions.

original: 'di ni yi ge ra'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ni yi ge ra'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the letter Ra.

original: yi ge pa ni chos @40b thams cad kyi sgo ste don dam par khyad par med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: yi ge pa ni chos @40b thams cad kyi sgo ste don dam par khyad par med pa'i phyir //
translated: The door of all phenomena is the letter Pa, because ultimately there is no distinction.

original: 'di ni chos thams cad don dam par khyad par med do //üîΩde yang de bzhin nyid du de lta bu yin te //
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad don dam par khyad par med do // de yang de bzhin nyid du de lta bu yin te //
translated: This is the ultimate non-distinction of all phenomena.

original: de ni med pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ni med pa'i don to //
translated: And that is suchness, and that is the meaning of non-existence.

original: yi ge tsa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste //
analyzed: yi ge tsa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste //
translated: The door of all phenomena is the letter Ca, because all phenomena are characterized by cessation.

original: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pas 'di ni de bzhin nyid la 'chi ba dang skye ba med pa'i phyir tsa'i don to //
analyzed: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pas 'di ni de bzhin nyid la 'chi ba dang skye ba med pa'i phyir tsa'i don to //
translated: Since death and birth are not perceived, the meaning of na is that there is no death and birth in suchness.

original: yi ge na ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste ming dang bral bas na bdag gi ming med pa'i phyir na'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge na ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste ming dang bral bas na bdag gi ming med pa'i phyir na'i don to //
translated: The letter na is the door of all dharmas, and since it is free from names, the meaning of na is that there is no name of self.

original: de bzhin du yi ge la la sogs pa la de bzhin du rig par bya ste //
analyzed: de bzhin du yi ge la la sogs pa la de bzhin du rig par bya ste //
translated: Similarly, the letters la and so on should be understood in the same way.

original: de ni gzungs kyi tshogs so //üîΩsa bcu dang zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: de ni gzungs kyi tshogs so // sa bcu dang zhes bya ba ni //
translated: That is the collection of dhƒÅra·πáƒ´s.üîΩAs for the ten stages,

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'phag pa rnams kyis ni bcu ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'phag pa rnams kyis ni bcu ste //
translated: the noble bodhisattvas have ten.

original: de dag ni sa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: de dag ni sa'i tshogs so //
translated: Those are the collection of stages.

original: de yang rab tu dga' dang // dri ma med dang 'od 'phro ba dang // sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du 'gyur ba dang // ring du song ba dang // mi g-yo ba dang // legs pa'i blo gros dang // chos kyi sprin no //
analyzed: de yang rab tu dga' dang // dri ma med dang 'od 'phro ba dang // sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du 'gyur ba dang // ring du song ba dang // mi g-yo ba dang // legs pa'i blo gros dang // chos kyi sprin no //
translated: They are the Joyous, the Stainless, the Radiant, the Brilliant, the Hard-to-Conquer, the Approaching, the Gone Afar, the Immovable, the Excellent Intelligence, and the Cloud of Dharma.

original: de la gang dang po la bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam thob pas rab tu dga' ba ste //
analyzed: de la gang dang po la bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam thob pas rab tu dga' ba ste //
translated: The first is the Joyful One, because one obtains the supramundane path and accomplishes the welfare of self and other.

original: des byang chub sems dpa' 'di rab tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: des byang chub sems dpa' 'di rab tu dga' ba'o //
translated: The bodhisattva is joyful because of that.

original: de nas 'di la tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dri ma dang bral ba de ba na dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: de nas 'di la tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dri ma dang bral ba de ba na dri ma med pa'o //
translated: Then, because it is free from the stain of immorality, it is the Stainless One.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la ting nge 'dzin ma nyams pa la brten nas chos snang ba de bas na 'od byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la ting nge 'dzin ma nyams pa la brten nas chos snang ba de bas na 'od byed pa'o //
translated: Because the light of Dharma is based on undiminished concentration, it is the Radiant One.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la byang chub kyi phyogs kyis nyon mongs pa'i bud shing sreg pa de bas na 'od 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la byang chub kyi phyogs kyis nyon mongs pa'i bud shing sreg pa de bas na 'od 'phro ba'o //
translated: Because the firewood of affliction is burned by the factors of enlightenment, it is the One with Flaming Intellect.

original: gang gi phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ma rig pa dang bden pa'i shes pa phan tshun 'gal ba dka' bas sbyong bar byed pa de bas na sbyang dka' ba'o //

translated: Because it is difficult to unite supramundane non-knowledge and knowledge of the truths, which are mutually contradictory, it is the Difficult to Conquer.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon du 'gyur zhing gnas pa de bas na mngon du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon du 'gyur zhing gnas pa de bas na mngon du gyur pa'o //
translated: Because in this stage the perfection of wisdom called ‚Äúfree from attachment‚Äù manifests and abides, since dependent origination is thoroughly differentiated, it is called the manifest.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la byang chub kyi phyogs dang // bden pa dang // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dmigs nas mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing rtsol ba dang bcas pa de bas na ring du song ba'o //

translated: Because in this stage, having focused on the factors of enlightenment, the truths, and dependent origination, one abides in the absence of attributes and exerts effort, it is called the far-reaching.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la de nyid rang gi ngang gi 'byung ba'i phyir mi g-yo pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la de nyid rang gi ngang gi 'byung ba'i phyir mi g-yo pa'o //
translated: Because in this stage, since the perfection of power manifests and abides, it is called the immovable.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la so so yang dag par rig pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' legs par ston pas legs pa'i blo gros so //üîΩgang gi phyir 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal @41a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la so so yang dag par rig pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' legs par ston pas legs pa'i blo gros so //üîΩgang gi phyir 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal @41a * //
translated: Because in this stage, since the perfection of aspiration manifests and abides, it is called the excellent wisdom.üîΩBecause in this stage, since the perfection of knowledge manifests and abides, it is called the cloud of Dharma.

original: tshab du dbang bskur ba de bas na chos kyi sprin no //
analyzed: tshab du dbang bskur ba de bas na chos kyi sprin no //
translated: The cloud of dharma is the consecration of the bodhisattva who is in the tenth stage.

original: 'di dag re re yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yang dag par bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag re re yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yang dag par bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Each of these is also included in the six perfections.

analyzed: de la go rims bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcur yang bya ba yin te bcu gang zhe na /
translated: They are also to be known as the ten perfections, in order, what are the ten?

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes te 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes te 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o //
translated: Generosity, morality, patience, exertion, meditation, wisdom, expedients, vows, powers, and knowledge.

original: de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sgo nas nye bar bsags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /

original: thabs des de mi zad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs des de mi zad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because by that expedient, it is made inexhaustible.üîΩAnd that is said:

original: de yang / byang chub bsngos pa'i dge ba ni //
analyzed: de yang / byang chub bsngos pa'i dge ba ni //
translated: The wholesome which is dedicated to enlightenment

original: byang chub bar du zad pa med //üîΩrgya mtshor chu thigs gtor ba yang //
analyzed: byang chub bar du zad pa med // rgya mtshor chu thigs gtor ba yang //
translated: until enlightenment, they are inexhaustible.üîΩJust as a drop of water thrown into the ocean

original: 'jig pa'i bskal bar gnas pa bzhin //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i bskal bar gnas pa bzhin //
translated: remains until the end of an aeon,üîΩso the offerings to the Buddhas

original: zhes smos so //
analyzed: zhes smos so //

original: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam la sogs pa dang / gang gi skye ba thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //üîΩsgom pa'i stobs dang / so sor brtags pa'i stobs dang / gang yang nyin re 'am /

translated: The perfection of vows is the practice of the six perfections in all one's lives, as in the Vows of Good Conduct.

original: skad cig re re la de dag spyod pa ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig re re la de dag spyod pa ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of power is the practice of those perfections by the power of meditation and the power of analysis, and by the power of the vow to practice them every day or every moment.

original: dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin nam sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin par theg pa chen po yongs su shes pa ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ji lta ba bzhin nam sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin par theg pa chen po yongs su shes pa ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The perfection of pristine awareness is the understanding of the Great Vehicle, not according to the literal meaning but according to the intended meaning.

original: sa rnams ni sa bcu pa la sogs pa las rgyas par bstan to //
analyzed: sa rnams ni sa bcu pa la sogs pa las rgyas par bstan to //
translated: The ten spiritual levels are explained in detail in the Ten Spiritual Levels Scripture and other texts.

original: sa sbyong ba ni yang bcom ldan 'das yum chen mo dag la brtags pa dang / rjes su bstan pa yin no /üîΩ/ sa rnams sbyong ba'i dbang du byas nas /

original: bstan bcos las tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu gsungs te /
analyzed: bstan bcos las tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu gsungs te /
translated: With regard to the purification of the levels, twenty verses are stated in the treatise.

analyzed: de dag kyang sa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor bshad par bya ste / yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis //
translated: These should be explained individually according to the levels.

original: sa ni dang po 'thob 'gyur te //
analyzed: sa ni dang po 'thob 'gyur te //
translated: The first level is attained through ten complete purifications.üîΩThe nature of intention and benefit,

original: bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang / sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid //
analyzed: bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang / sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid //

analyzed: gang gi phyir brtag pa ni mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du med pa'i phyir skye ba dang 'gag pa med de de bas na gnyis ka yang mi mthong ngo //
translated: Since the examination of form, etc., does not exist as it is apprehended, they do not arise and do not cease. Therefore, he does not see either.

original: gzhan dbang ldog pa med par lan btab pa bkag pa yin nam ;
analyzed: gzhan dbang ldog pa med par lan btab pa bkag pa yin nam ;

original: de nas tshig drug gis ni brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa na skye ba yin la /
analyzed: de nas tshig drug gis ni brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa na skye ba yin la /

analyzed: mi rten pa dang mngon par zhen pa med pa de'i tshe ni ldog par 'dod do //

original: sngon skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / snga ma ni rang @49b gi ngang gis 'jig pa'i phyir de ltar na de dag ni skye ba med pa dang 'jig pa med pa de'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: sngon skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / snga ma ni rang @49b gi ngang gis 'jig pa'i phyir de ltar na de dag ni skye ba med pa dang 'jig pa med pa de'i ngo bo nyid do //

original: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig gzhan dbang gi rang gi ngo bo'i dbang du byas pa yin no snyam pa 'di /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig gzhan dbang gi rang gi ngo bo'i dbang du byas pa yin no snyam pa 'di /

original: thams cad sems la bzhag nas dri ba ni /
analyzed: thams cad sems la bzhag nas dri ba ni /

original: gang gzugs la sogs pa skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa de dag ni de'i dngos po med pa dag ste /
analyzed: gang gzugs la sogs pa skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa de dag ni de'i dngos po med pa dag ste /

analyzed: dngos po med pa yang skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo ma yin te /

analyzed: gang yang dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo gzhan dbang yin no zhes gsungs pa ni dngos po med pa gnyis med na ni 'byung ba'i don gyis te /

analyzed: 'dir shes rab kyang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: gang chos thams cad rtag pa dang bde ba dang / gtsang ba dang / bdag dang spong ma ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa dang / mi dben ba dang / so sor yang de las bzlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bzlog cing bkag pas nye bar rtog pa'o //

analyzed: thob par bya ba yang med par blta bar bya ba kho na'o // gang de nyid ni kun brtags kyi chos rnams @52a * //

original: mi dmigs pa nyid de /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa nyid de /

original: skyes pas na skye ba yin te /
analyzed: skyes pas na skye ba yin te /

analyzed: skye ba ni skyes pa'i chos te rnam pa thams cad pa nyid kyi'o / mi skye ba ni skye ba'i chos te /

analyzed: gang gi phyir spobs par mi nus zhes bya ba ni zur gyis dris pa'o //

analyzed: smras so zhes bya ba ni rab 'byor gyis lan smras so //

analyzed: de bzhin du so sor snang ngo zhes bya bas ni 'jug sdud pa yin no //
